channel.title: Business of Software Conference Scholarship Tickets
channel.description:
If anyone is considering coming to Business of Software Conference in Boston in September but just can't stretch to the ticket price this year - you should consider applying for a scholarship.
http://businessofsoftware.org/2015/08/guest-post-john-knox-business-software-scholarships-now-available/
